column4: Hello all !, Hey, i have a serious problem ! I'm able to play avi and mp4 files with totem dvd player., but, unable to play anything else ! I've done some of everything but nothing's appearing to work ! HELP PLEASE ANYONE -LOL-!
I've tried VLC but was unable to get it to work ! Is there a code that i need to type in terminal?
vlc works fine for me. try running it from the terminal to see what's wrong
- ok, i'll give it another try !
